feedstock_sources.name: Post-consumer cotton textiles
feedstock_sources.description: Post-consumer cotton textiles, cellulosic waste, enzymes, yeast

feedstock_sources.name: Post-consumer cotton
feedstock_sources.description: Post-consumer cotton, superconcentrated hydrochloric acid (HCl) or sulfuric acid

feedstock_sources.name: Mixed post-consumer plastics (PE
feedstock_sources.description: Mixed post-consumer plastics (PE, PP, PS), catalyst

feedstock_sources.name: End-of-life printed circuit boards (PCBs)
feedstock_sources.description: End-of-life printed circuit boards (PCBs), leaching chemicals

feedstock_sources.name: Sawdust
feedstock_sources.description: Sawdust, lignocellulosic waste, dilute sulfuric acid

feedstock_sources.name: Mixed waste glass
feedstock_sources.description: Mixed waste glass, foaming agent (SiC, CaCO3)

products.name: Diesel-like fuel oil
products.description: Diesel-like fuel oil, gasoline fraction, gas fraction

chemhub_processes.title: Cotton Waste to Bioethanol
chemhub_processes.scientific_basis: The process involves pretreatment (shredding), enzymatic hydrolysis, fermentation, distillation
chemhub_processes.technology_requirements: Shredders, hydrolysis reactors, fermentation tanks, distillation columns
chemhub_processes.skill_requirements: Chemical Engineering, Microbiology, Process Operation, Supply Chain Management

chemhub_processes.title: Cotton Waste to Glucose Syrup
chemhub_processes.scientific_basis: The process involves acid hydrolysis, neutralization, purification
chemhub_processes.technology_requirements: Acid-resistant reactors, filtration systems, neutralization tanks, evaporators
chemhub_processes.skill_requirements: Chemical Engineering, Industrial Chemistry, Safety Management

chemhub_processes.title: Polycotton Waste to PEF Monomers
chemhub_processes.process_description: Selective Hydrolysis (e.g., Avantium Dawn Technology), Catalytic Conversion
chemhub_processes.scientific_basis: The process involves selective hydrolysis (e.g., avantium dawn technology), catalytic conversion
chemhub_processes.technology_requirements: Specialized hydrolysis reactors, catalytic converters, separation units
chemhub_processes.skill_requirements: Organic Chemistry, Catalysis, Chemical Engineering, Polymer Science

chemhub_processes.title: Mixed Plastic Waste to Fuel Oil
chemhub_processes.scientific_basis: The process involves pyrolysis, catalytic cracking, distillation
chemhub_processes.technology_requirements: Pyrolysis reactor, catalytic cracking unit, distillation columns
chemhub_processes.skill_requirements: Chemical Engineering, Process Control, Thermochemical Conversion

chemhub_processes.title: Printed Circuit Boards to Precious Metals
chemhub_processes.process_description: Mechanical Processing, Hydrometallurgical Leaching, Selective Precipitation
chemhub_processes.scientific_basis: The process involves mechanical processing, hydrometallurgical leaching, selective precipitation
chemhub_processes.technology_requirements: Shredders, leaching tanks, precipitation vessels, filtration equipment
chemhub_processes.skill_requirements: Metallurgical Engineering, Chemical Engineering, Analytical Chemistry

chemhub_processes.title: Orange Peels to Limonene
chemhub_processes.scientific_basis: The process involves steam distillation, fractionation
chemhub_processes.technology_requirements: Steam generator, distillation unit, condensers, separation equipment
chemhub_processes.skill_requirements: Chemical Engineering, Essential Oil Production, Quality Control

chemhub_processes.title: Rice Husks to Silica
chemhub_processes.scientific_basis: The process involves alkali extraction, acid precipitation, calcination
chemhub_processes.skill_requirements: Materials Science, Process Engineering, Inorganic Chemistry

chemhub_processes.title: Concrete Waste to Aggregates
chemhub_processes.scientific_basis: The process involves crushing, screening, contaminant removal
chemhub_processes.technology_requirements: Jaw crushers, impact crushers, screening equipment, magnetic separators
chemhub_processes.skill_requirements: Civil Engineering, Materials Testing, Equipment Operation

chemhub_processes.title: Sawdust to Furfural
chemhub_processes.scientific_basis: The process involves acid hydrolysis, steam distillation
chemhub_processes.skill_requirements: Chemical Engineering, Bioproduct Development, Process Control

chemhub_processes.title: Waste Glass to Foam Glass
chemhub_processes.scientific_basis: The process involves crushing, mixing, sintering, annealing
chemhub_processes.technology_requirements: Glass crushers, mixers, tunnel kiln, annealing lehr
chemhub_processes.skill_requirements: Materials Engineering, Thermal Processing, Quality Control

mission_statements: Transforming waste into economic opportunity through cooperative value chains
Building self-sufficient circular economy nodes in communities worldwide
Creating sustainable livelihoods through waste valorization
Democratizing access to circular economy technologies
